name: Prom
description: Prom is a gaming NFT marketplace & rental. Completely decentralized, confidential, and safe, it meets the needs of players, metaverse-enthusiasts, NFT owners, guilds, and games. In a word, our project boldly aims to establish a sound future for the whole industry. To stay secure and efficient, we explore the potential of NFT gaming, work with experts, and experiment with promising tools. As a result, we already have designed a unique ecosystem that is fit for lending, renting, and spotlessly exchanging ideas. To get convinced, check some of our features. - Rent gaming assets without any collateral or lend out your assets to other players to make an additional profit. - Purchase any NFT in monthly installments, get a mortgage or leasing for lands and spaces in the metaverses. - Trade and exchange NFT assets from various games in a unified interface and access internal gaming marketplaces across multiple games. - Easily manage NFT assets across all the platforms and view statistics.
